alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:44AM AKST until December 17 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONT TO BRING HEAVY SNOW TO THE HIGHWAY... .A passing front is bringing moisture to the panhandle. While morning temps near Skagway are near 40, much colder temps in the 20s are found higher up along the Klondike highway. Therefore, mainly rain is expected for Skagway and heavy snow is expected at higher elevations. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway above 1500 feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Gusty winds could cause blowing snow and reduced visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Blowing snow will reduce visibilities. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
